title: Leadership and Organizational Learning Strategies for Quality Management in Sports Organizations

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Case studies and simulations of sports organizations using math-based analysis

learning_goals: The impact of visionary leadership elements on employee engagement can be quantified.
A statistical model can be designed where organizational learning plays a partial mediating role in the relationship between leadership and employee engagement.
A survey design and analysis process for quality management in sports organizations can be implemented.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
